caption:
This photograph captures a dynamic scene at a youth baseball game. In the foreground, a young batter in full swing is the focal point. The batter wears a white and dark striped uniform labeled "TOWN & COUNTRY" and a protective helmet, and is in the midst of hitting a baseball, poised at the end of his follow-through.

Behind the batter, a catcher and an umpire are closely observing the play. The catcher, also in a matching striped uniform, is crouched in a catching position, wearing protective gear including shin guards, a chest protector, and a catcher's mask. The umpire, to the right, wears a dark colored shirt and a protective facemask as well.

In the background, several elements add to the ambiance of a community sports event. The scene is set against a backdrop of a fenced-off spectator area where various people, presumably family and friends, are visible. Some are seated, watching intently, while others stand or perform gestures like cheering. The scoreboard in the deep background labels the visitors' side, underscored by lush green trees indicating a suburban or rural park setting.

Overall, the composition of the photo, with its focus on the action of batting juxtaposed with attentive onlookers, vividly captures the essence of a youth sporting event, highlighting the intensity and enjoyment associated with it.
title: Little league baseball game. Played on lot built on sanitary landfill. (From the Documerica-1 exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 63, 64, 65.)
